<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"default":{"description":"The result of the write operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ref":{"required":["name"],"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"pattern":"^[0-9A-Za-z]{22}$","type":"string","description":"The asset identifier","example":"7Bt8M3cXEP6BHPh8r47DYf"},"name":{"pattern":"^\\w+$","type":"string","description":"The attribute name","example":"location"}},"title":"AttributeRef"},"failure":{"type":"string","enum":["ASSET_NOT_FOUND","ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND","INSUFFICIENT_ACCESS","INVALID_VALUE","INTERCEPTOR_FAILURE","STATE_STORAGE_FAILED","CANNOT_PROCESS","QUEUE_FULL","UNKNOWN","ASSET_ID_MISSING","ATTRIBUTE_NAME_MISSING"]}},"title":"AttributeWriteResult"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
